name: Space Drop (itch)
description:
Very short game made for college. 

Take the role of an astronaut trapped in an arena built for the amusement of interdimensional aliens. Fight against waves of robots using your sick astronaut moves.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire
  • Right Mouse Button - Slow motion
  • Left Shift - Dash

Advanced Movement:

  • Jump while running towards a wall to wall run
  • Jump while in air to double jump
  • Jump while moving towards a wall to wall jump

Credits:

  • Programming - Nicole Fanelli (that's me)
  • Concept art and weapon model - Bryan Hussan
  • Hud sprites and menu background - Helder Lage
  • Documentation - Nicolas Junio
  • Textures, stage design and enemy models - Pedro Viktor
  • Sounds and music used from freesounds.org
